Performance:
February 1978: A Chushingura's Subplot

Production: February 1978

Play: A Chushingura's Subplot (義士銘々伝)

– Click image to view.

Scenes:

The Suicide with a Scythe (弥作鎌腹 / Yasaku kamabara)

Characters:

Okaya (Nyōbō Okaya / 女房おかや)

Yasaku, a farmer (Hyakushō Yasaku / 百姓弥作)

Wasuke Kayano (Kayano Wasuke / 萱野和助)

Shichidayu (Shibamura Shichidayū / 芝村七太夫)

Kakubei (Tanuki no Kakubei / 狸の角兵衛)
